==Interactables==

===Secret Source Dragon Idol Workshop Engraving===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:"...[[Xiuhcoatl|I]] am the Creator, the Shaper, the Forger of all names. The begetter of soil, gold, and (...). I shall bring ruin upon the arch-enemies of the [[Ancient Sacred Mountain|Sacred City of Tollan]]..."
:&nbsp;
:"...Let their bodies bloat, their legs swell with pus, their throats be choked and chests be crushed, let them collapse by the wayside, their faces stained a deep yellow..."
:&nbsp;
:"...I shall not be trampled by the [[Heavenly Principles|usurper of the sky]], nor consumed by the [[Abyss|black tides]] of the earth. As long as my craft endures, so too shall Tollan's glory; and with it, the radiance of the primal flame..."
{{Dialogue End}}
